# Introduction to Monte Carlo simulations for Cooperative Games

Cooperative game theory and power indices are techniques traditionally used to analyse voting in committees or influence in networks.

## What is a Monte Carlo simulation

When problems are too big to solve exactly, a Monte Carlo simulation can be used. Random samples of the problem are evaluated and to obtain a approximate result.
